snippet: The evidence widens the pool of those at risk from the virus, which had been thought to pass only from men to women or between two men during sex....
abstract: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention and New York City Department of Health and Mental Hygiene report first case of female-to-male sexual transmission of Zika virus, widening pool of people who could be at risk of infection; experts and officials reassess healthcare guidelines for limiting spread of disease.
lead_paragraph: The evidence widens the pool of those at risk from the virus, which had been thought to pass only from men to women or between two men during sex.

headline.main: Twist in Zika Outbreak: New York Case Shows Women Can Spread It to Men
headline.print_headline: New Twist in Zika Outbreak: Evidence Shows Women Can Give It to Men

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
